meanings.sent1: We will coedit the document together.
meanings.sent2: Let's coedit this article as a team.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to coedit the presentation for accuracy.
meanings.sent4: They coedit the script like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: Coediting makes the work faster and more precise.

meanings.definition: To be an editor with others.
meanings.sent1: She and I coedit the magazine every month.
meanings.sent2: They coedit the newspaper to ensure quality.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coedit the family newsletter for fun.
meanings.sent4: Together, they coedit the book with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: Coediting allows for diverse perspectives in editing.
